mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOURLIST( NUM, NAME, THEMECODE, PRICE, DISCOUNT, REG_KEYWORD, SUMMARY, IMGURL, CONTENTS, POSTCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, ADDRESS4, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, CONTACT, REGDATE, REGID, MODDATE, READCOUNT, RECOMMEND, STEAMED, REVIEWCOUNT,STATUS ) VALUES( #{num}, #{name}, #{themecode},#{price},#{discount}, #{regkeyword}, #{summary}, #{imgurl}, #{contents}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{contact}, SYSDATE, #{regid}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0,'01' )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC, REGDATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM,NUM,NAME,THEMECODE,PRICE,DISCOUNT,REG_KEYWORD,SUMMARY,IMGURL, POSTCODE,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,ADDRESS3,ADDRESS4,READCOUNT,RECOMMEND,STEAMED,REVIEWCOUNT, REGID,REGDATE,MODDATE, (CASE STATUS WHEN '01' THEN '노출' WHEN '02' THEN '비노출' END) AS STATUS FROM TOURLIST WHERE 1=1
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND REGID = #{regid}
AND ADDRESS1 = #{address1}
AND ADDRESS2 = #{address2}
AND REGID NOT IN (#{aroundAddrRegId})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(THEMECODE, #{themecode})
AND REG_KEYWORD LIKE '%'|| #{regkeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%'
ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
ORDER BY MODDATE DESC
ORDER BY READCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY RECOMMEND DESC
ORDER BY STEAMED DESC
ORDER BY REVIEWCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STEAMED DESC, REGDATE DESC ) AS ROW_NUM, NUM,NAME, (CASE THEMECODE WHEN '01' THEN '숲/산' WHEN '02' THEN '해변/바다' WHEN '03' THEN '강/호수/계곡' WHEN '04' THEN '도심' WHEN '05' THEN '섬' END) AS THEMECODE , REG_KEYWORD,SUMMARY,IMGURL, STEAMED, POSTCODE,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,ADDRESS3,ADDRESS4 FROM TOURLIST WHERE 1=1 AND STATUS = '01' ) WHERE ROW_NUM <= 3 ORDER BY STEAMED DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STEAMED DESC, REGDATE DESC ) AS ROW_NUM, NUM,NAME, (CASE THEMECODE WHEN '01' THEN '베스트' WHEN '02' THEN '제주여행' WHEN '03' THEN '내륙여행' WHEN '04' THEN '섬여행' END) AS THEMECODE , SUMMARY,IMGURL, STEAMED FROM TOURLIST WHERE ADDRESS1 = #{address1} AND ADDRESS2 = #{address2} AND STATUS = '01' ) WHERE ROW_NUM <= 6 ORDER BY STEAMED DESC
